    • Method Detail

      • addPlayer

        public void addPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
             Game game,
             PlantType plantType,
             ZombieType zombieType)
        Adds a player to a game with the specified plant and/or zombie type.
        If plantType or zombieType is null, the player will be added to the opposite team.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to be added
        game - the game to add the player to
        plantType - the type of plant the player chose, if any
        zombieType - the type of zombie the player chose, if any

      • addToPlants

        public void addToPlants(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
               Game game,
               PlantType type,
               boolean message)
        Adds a player to the plant team
        Parameters:
        player - the player to add
        game - the game the player is in
        type - the type/kit the player chose
        message - whether or not to send the player a join message

      • addToZombies

        public void addToZombies(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                Game game,
                ZombieType type,
                boolean message)
        Adds a player to the zombie team
        Parameters:
        player - the player to add
        game - the game the player is in
        type - the type/kit the player chose
        message - whether or not to send the player a join message

      • removePlant

        public void removePlant(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Removes a plant player from a game
        Parameters:
        player - the player to remove

        public void removeZombie(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Removes a zombie player from the game
        Parameters:
        player - the player to remove
